0.1.0.name: wordpress/national-terrorism-advisory-system-widget
0.1.0.description:
This widget Places the National Terrorism Advisory System widget from the Department of Homeland Security on your website. The widget is automatically updated as the Department of Homeland Security's NTAS website) issues advisories.

The following aspects are customizeable:

  • Widget title
  • NTAS Widget width in pixels
  • NTAS Widget height in pixels

Clicking the widget pops open a new window to the NTAS advisory page: http://www.dhs.gov/files/programs/ntas.shtm#current.
